post.body: fastin 2day. prolly just 2day. but who knows? im so frickin huge now D': <3 s
at least ppl r supportive of me now. the trolls r gone. YAY!!!! <3 s
GAK! the trolls r bak! sumbudy gt me a big long stik!!!! D: <3 s
well sum ppl wer nice. thts a relief from the horror of earlier :/
no sympathy. no sympathy at all. ;_____;
my life is over D':
i got in the jacuzzi. it was cold. what a rip. D: <3 s
damn jacuzzis relay is acting trippy. tooka bubble bath, but STILL waiting 4 t 2 heat up. had sum Quorn nuggets, spinach + papaya 4 din-din
still didn't get in that jacuzzi :/ i'll go now, i swear, b4 my dad yells at me for "not using" it D: <3 s
might jump in the jacuzzi in a bit. i'm cold, plus it's a great distraction from eating ;D sarie
gettin' ready to skype w/ my bro who's in Vietnam. YAY!!!! :D
listening to muzik =P
gonna get sum moar h2o ;D
my dad burned my pizza but i ate it anyway. god i'm so full. BLEBBB xP
post here: http://tinyurl.com/5cctwl
yesterday and today i binged! *frustrated groan* when will i EVER get control back?????
1,964 cals today. TOTAL fail. ugh. D': -s
i only consumed 160 cals at the c.f. success! only 223 cals for the day (total) ;D -s
i think i have food poisoning from my mom's nursing home leftovers. uck. at last a have an excuse not to eat tonight at the c. f.
that's weird. when i got up at 6:30 i weighed 118. now i'm 116. huh. well that's good i guess. :/ -s
